backend/main.mo: Main calculator actor with methods for inputNumber, calculate (add/subtract/multiply/divide with zero-check), getResult, and clear, maintaining currentOperand and result state with migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that preserves currentOperand and result state when upgrading the actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented calculator features including backspace, continuous calculation, percentage, dual-line display, plus/minus toggle, and operator highlighting.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Summaries of frontend files including game components, hooks, and styling that are not part of the calculator functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode variables for calculator theming.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with calculator title and meta description, mounting React app to root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wrapping Calculator with QueryClientProvider and displaying footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Calculator.tsx: Main calculator component implementing UI with dual-line display, number/operator buttons, backspace, decimal, percentage, sign toggle, and state management for operations and chaining.
frontend/src/components/Game/AbilityEffe: Empty file, not used in calculator functionality.
frontend/src/components/Game/AttackEffec: Empty file, not used in calculator functionality.
frontend/src/components/Game/Camera.tsx: Empty file, not used in calculator functionality.
frontend/src/components/Game/Enemy.tsx: Empty file, not used in calculator functionality.
frontend/src/components/Game/EnemySpawne: Empty file, not used in calculator functionality.
frontend/src/components/Game/Environment: Empty file, not used in calculator functionality.
frontend/src/components/Game/GameHUD.tsx: Empty file, not used in calculator functionality.
frontend/src/components/Game/GameScene.t: Empty file, not used in calculator functionality.
frontend/src/components/Game/HealthBar.t: Empty file, not used in calculator functionality.
frontend/src/components/Game/HeroCharact: Empty file, not used in calculator functionality.
frontend/src/components/Game/MechSpawner: Empty file, not used in calculator functionality.
frontend/src/components/Game/MechVehicle: Empty file, not used in calculator functionality.
frontend/src/components/Game/RamCharacte: Empty file, not used in calculator functionality.
frontend/src/components/GameOverScreen.t: Empty file, not used in calculator functionality.
frontend/src/components/HeroSelectionScr: Empty file, not used in calculator functionality.
frontend/src/components/MapSelectionScre: Empty file, not used in calculator functionality.
frontend/src/components/StartScreen.tsx: Empty file, not used in calculator functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCalculator.ts: Custom hook providing mutations for inputNumber, calculate, and clear operations with loading states, using the actor from useActor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCombat.ts: Empty file, not used in calculator functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnemyAI.ts: Empty file, not used in calculator functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnemyHealth.ts: Empty file, not used in calculator functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameFlow.ts: Empty file, not used in calculator functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameState.ts: Empty file, not used in calculator functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useHeroAbility.ts: Empty file, not used in calculator functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useHeroSelection.ts: Empty file, not used in calculator functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMapSelection.ts: Empty file placeholder for map selection hook functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerControls.ts: Empty file placeholder for player controls hook functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty file placeholder for query management hook functionality.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, defining colors for UI components, sidebar, charts, and layout variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for the main game page component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending default theme with custom OKLCH colors, border radius variables, animations, typography and container query plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking existing features for a 3D game with player character customization, combat system, multiple map environments, and mythology-inspired visual themes transitioning to modern settings.
